name: Minitrue
description:
Minitrue is a game about social media, free speak and voice. In this game, the player will be a college student who is a click farmer in order to pay his student loan. However, as he becomes more and more influential, he loses the control over his account, voice or even life. 

This game is click based. All buttons are labeled in the game. 

Press  R to restart 

Press Q to quite 

Enjoy
